column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////I thought the Malnati Chicago Classic (sausage
column4: butter crust) was very good. It had a natural tomato flavor
column5: with a nice helping of cheese along an interesting "butter crust". The sausage brought very little to the equation
column6: lacking flavor but adding texture. The crust is much different (and not comparable to other types of pizza). This type of crust has a crumbly effect it
